ABS.title: ABS Warning Light
ABS.description: Indicates a malfunction in the Anti-lock Braking System. Safe braking could be affected.
recommendation: Drive cautiously and avoid hard braking.
Visit a mechanic to inspect the ABS sensors and brake system.

Air Suspension.title: Air Suspension Warning
Air Suspension.description: Problem with the air suspension system. Ride quality may be impacted.
recommendation: Avoid rough roads to prevent further damage.
Have the air suspension system checked for leaks or pump issues.

Airbag Indicator Light.title: Airbag Indicator
Airbag Indicator Light.description: There may be a fault in the airbag system. The airbag may not deploy properly.
recommendation: Schedule an inspection at a certified repair center.
Avoid driving until the airbag system is verified.

Automatic Gearbox Warning.title: Automatic Gearbox Warning
Automatic Gearbox Warning.description: Issue detected in the automatic transmission system. May require inspection.
recommendation: Avoid high speeds and heavy loads.
Have the transmission fluid and system diagnosed by a technician.

Automatic Shift Lock or Engine Start Ind.title: Shift Lock/Start Indicator
Automatic Shift Lock or Engine Start Ind.description: Indicates the brake must be pressed to shift from park or to start the engine.
recommendation: Ensure your foot is firmly on the brake before shifting.
Check for faults if this indicator stays on.

Battery Alert Light.title: Battery Alert Light
Battery Alert Light.description: Battery is not charging properly. Check alternator or battery terminals.
recommendation: Inspect and clean the battery terminals.
Have the alternator and charging system tested.

Brake Warning Light.title: Brake Warning Light
Brake Warning Light.description: Problem with the braking system. Check brake fluid or brake pads immediately.
recommendation: Stop the vehicle and check brake fluid level.
Do not drive until brakes are inspected by a mechanic.

Check Engine Light.title: Check Engine Light
Check Engine Light.description: Indicates engine or emission issues. Needs diagnostic scan.
recommendation: Use an OBD-II scanner or visit a service center for diagnostics.
Avoid high-speed driving until resolved.

Coolant Temperature Warning Light.title: Coolant Temperature Warning
Coolant Temperature Warning Light.description: Engine temperature is too high. Stop the vehicle and allow it to cool down.
recommendation: Turn off the engine immediately to prevent damage.
Check coolant level and radiator cap.

DPF light.title: Diesel Particulate Filter (DPF) Light
DPF light.description: DPF may be clogged. Consider regeneration or service.
recommendation: Drive at higher RPMs for passive regeneration.
Visit a service center for DPF cleaning or replacement.

Eco Driving Indicator.title: Eco Driving Indicator
Eco Driving Indicator.description: Indicates optimal driving efficiency. No action needed.
recommendation: Maintain current driving behavior.
Monitor fuel economy for consistency.

Engine Temperature Warning Light.title: Engine Overheating
Engine Temperature Warning Light.description: Engine is overheating. Stop vehicle and check coolant level.
recommendation: Turn off the engine and let it cool.
Check coolant level and radiator system.

Fog Lamp Indicator Light.title: Fog Lamp Indicator
Fog Lamp Indicator Light.description: Indicates fog lights are turned on.
recommendation: Use only in foggy or low-visibility conditions.
Turn off when not needed to avoid dazzling others.

Glow Plug Indicator.title: Glow Plug Warning
Glow Plug Indicator.description: Glow plugs may be faulty. Common in diesel vehicles.
recommendation: Wait for the glow plug light to turn off before starting.
Inspect glow plugs if starting issues occur.

Lamp Out.title: Exterior Lamp Out
Lamp Out.description: One or more exterior lights are not functioning.
recommendation: Check and replace faulty bulbs.
Inspect wiring or fuse if issue persists.

Lane Departure Warning Light.title: Lane Departure Warning
Lane Departure Warning Light.description: Vehicle is unintentionally drifting out of its lane.
recommendation: Hold the steering wheel firmly.
Stay attentive and avoid distractions.

Low Fuel Indicator Light.title: Low Fuel Warning
Low Fuel Indicator Light.description: Fuel level is low. Refuel soon.
recommendation: Refuel at the nearest station.
Avoid running the tank dry.

OD.title: Overdrive Indicator
OD.description: Indicates overdrive is engaged or disengaged. Usually informational.
recommendation: Use overdrive for highway driving.
Turn off in hilly terrain or towing mode.

Oil.title: Oil Pressure Warning
Oil.description: Low oil pressure detected. Stop vehicle and check oil level.
recommendation: Stop engine immediately to prevent damage.
Check oil level and top up if necessary.

Power Steering Warning Light.title: Power Steering Warning
Power Steering Warning Light.description: Problem with electric or hydraulic power steering system.
recommendation: Avoid sharp turns until checked.
Have power steering fluid and system inspected.

Seat Belt Reminder Light.title: Seat Belt Reminder
Seat Belt Reminder Light.description: One or more passengers have not fastened seat belts.
recommendation: Ensure all passengers fasten their seat belts.
Do not drive until everyone is safely buckled.

Security Indicator Light.title: Security Indicator
Security Indicator Light.description: Indicates the vehicle's anti-theft system is active or has an issue.
recommendation: Ensure the key or fob is functioning properly.
Have the security system inspected if the light stays on.

Steering Wheel Lock.title: Steering Lock Warning
Steering Wheel Lock.description: Steering wheel is locked. Try restarting the vehicle or checking ignition.
recommendation: Gently turn the wheel while turning the ignition key.
Contact a mechanic if the lock does not release.

Tire.title: Tire Pressure Warning
Tire.description: Tire pressure is low or system malfunction detected.
recommendation: Check and adjust tire pressure to the recommended level.
Inspect for punctures or leaks and repair as necessary.

Traction Control Light.title: Traction Control Active
Traction Control Light.description: Indicates the traction control system is active.
recommendation: Drive carefully, especially on slippery surfaces.
Let the system engage automatically as needed.

Traction Control Malfunction Light.title: Traction Control Malfunction
Traction Control Malfunction Light.description: Indicates a problem with the traction control system.
recommendation: Avoid aggressive driving until resolved.
Have the traction control system inspected.

Trailer Tow Hitch Warning.title: Tow Hitch Warning
Trailer Tow Hitch Warning.description: Trailer tow hitch not secured or detected malfunction.
recommendation: Ensure the trailer is properly connected.
Inspect hitch sensor or wiring if warning persists.

Transmission Temperature Warning Light.title: Transmission Overheat
Transmission Temperature Warning Light.description: Transmission temperature is too high. Stop vehicle and cool system.
recommendation: Stop and allow transmission to cool before proceeding.
Have transmission fluid level and condition checked.

Washer Fluid Indicator Light.title: Washer Fluid Low
Washer Fluid Indicator Light.description: Windshield washer fluid is low. Refill needed.
recommendation: Refill washer fluid reservoir with appropriate fluid.
Check for leaks if the warning persists after refill.
